articles.content: Its day two of the opening of OpenAIs buzzy GPT store, which offers customized versions of ChatGPT, and users are already breaking the rules. The Generative Pre-Trained Transformers (GPTs) are meant … [+2594 chars]

articles.description: Ambient solar tech is nothing new, as anyone who's used a calculator knows, but it's getting better.

articles.author: Andy Boxall
articles.title: The gaming smartphone is dead - Digital Trends
articles.description: The Asus ROG Phone 8 Pro has arrived at CES 2024, but it seems to have put the final nail in the coffin of the gaming smartphone as we knew it. Here's why.
articles.content:
Andy Boxall / Digital Trends
The true, dedicated gaming smartphone is dead.
No longer will we see a phone with the highest-resolution screen and fastest processor inside where the primary function … [+6264 chars]
